title: Moroccan mutton tagine with green beans and olives
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons argan oil or olive oil', '750g diced mutton', 'salt to taste', '1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 medium tomatoes, sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley and coriander', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1/3 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch saffron threads', '500g fresh or frozen green beans', '2 tablespoons green olives', 'chopped fresh coriander, to serve']
